analysis.key_quote: I don't understand why removing the employment protections of non-partisan career employees so that they can be replaced with partisan employees is in the public interest.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses concern about the removal of employment protections for non-partisan career employees, indicating opposition to the proposed rule. It highlights issues related to politicization and the integrity of the civil service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process.
